Method used to create a new view that inherits from the base Falcon View.

protoProps
Properties for the prototype of a class
staticProps
Static properties for a given object
var DogView = Falcon.View.extend({ bark: function() { console.log("The dog view barks"); } },{ says: function() { console.log("Woof!"); } }); var my_dog_view = new DogView(); DogView.says(); // => Woof! my_dog_view.bark(); // => The dog view barks
